title: Supercharge OKE deployments with OpenKruise: safer updates, sidecar management and cluster-wide ops
text: Learn how to enhance your Oracle Kubernetes Engine (OKE) deployments with OpenKruise — a powerful extension that adds production-grade capabilities like zero-downtime upgrades, sidecar lifecycle management, and cluster-wide job execution. This guide explains how OpenKruise integrates seamlessly with OKE using Terraform and Helm, helping you achieve safer updates, more efficient operations, and improved reliability for your workloads.
